reviewText: I liked how this DVD explores the basics in an easy, clear way.  It also explains some of the fundamentals that I think are important, but that many beginning players often never fully digest.
This video by Devin Armstrong was put together and narrated excellently. If you grasp the concepts of the playing sections to the end of the video and use them, you will be a successful poker player.
Enjoyable  book which has great details on some of those tricky spots that we get into at the tables.
Not bad.  Learned a thing or two and the basics.  For some reason it reminds me of a PBS special.
Awful narration, awful sound, awful videography..really not worth it. There are much better poker dvds in the market than this.
